game.name: Eggscape
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Captions available, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: You’re a chicken escaping the slaughter line. Find your stolen chicks and free your fellow chickens as you fight through the factory, and survive the hunt from workers and failed lab creations.
game.shortDescriptionEn: You’re a chicken escaping the slaughter line. Find your stolen chicks and free your fellow chickens as you fight through the factory, and survive the hunt from workers and failed lab creations.
